channel.title: Evidence of a lier
channel.description:
I have been good friends with cowie as you may know him here over the last month maybe, but the last two days he has brought this friendship to the dumpster. Here is my hard strong evidence i have on him. 4 days ago i restarted runescape after a very long time, he insisted to me and fury that he was getting free runescape cash with a cc generator. So i thought hey, this sounds good :). I refused many times to accept this file and try it myself. I asked if he could get me some money... The next day I kept asking if he could get me some money and he kept consistantly sending me this program and i kept declining. Today He told myself and flamed fury that he bought an account with some money that he bought with his cc generator. He told us that he payed 9.5mill for it. Here is a logged chat i had with him over msn
roses are red grass is green sit on my lap and ill bet ull scream-sell cc gen 350k rs2 each- says: Hey ™°°°♫♂BigMac♂♫°°°™---- says: Hi ™°°°♫♂BigMac♂♫°°°™---- says: how are you roses are red grass is green sit on my lap and ill bet ull scream-sell cc gen 350k rs2 each- says: Im good yourself ? ™°°°♫♂BigMac♂♫°°°™---- says: i'm fine roses are red grass is green sit on my lap and ill bet ull scream-sell cc gen 350k rs2 each- says: goood ™°°°♫♂BigMac♂♫°°°™---- says: just started wcing again roses are red grass is green sit on my lap and ill bet ull scream-sell cc gen 350k rs2 each- says: kl kl ™°°°♫♂BigMac♂♫°°°™---- says: how did you get 9m roses are red grass is green sit on my lap and ill bet ull scream-sell cc gen 350k rs2 each- says: bought it roses are red grass is green sit on my lap and ill bet ull scream-sell cc gen 350k rs2 each- says: with my new cc gen ™°°°♫♂BigMac♂♫°°°™---- says: omg you said you would sort me out with cash ™°°°♫♂BigMac♂♫°°°™---- says: now i'm beggining to think you're lying again. no body has seen your cash roses are red grass is green sit on my lap and ill bet ull scream-sell cc gen 350k rs2 each- says: i didnt say i would roses are red grass is green sit on my lap and ill bet ull scream-sell cc gen 350k rs2 each- says: you were asking fury roses are red grass is green sit on my lap and ill bet ull scream-sell cc gen 350k rs2 each- says: and shit ™°°°♫♂BigMac♂♫°°°™---- says: i asked both of you ™°°°♫♂BigMac♂♫°°°™---- says: what roses are red grass is green sit on my lap and ill bet ull scream-sell cc gen 350k rs2 each- says: and i bought an account roses are red grass is green sit on my lap and ill bet ull scream-sell cc gen 350k rs2 each- says: and its been took back ™°°°♫♂BigMac♂♫°°°™---- says: see.. no body has seen your cash or anything roses are red grass is green sit on my lap and ill bet ull scream-sell cc gen 350k rs2 each- says: i fucking hate sythe fucking scamming wankers roses are red grass is green sit on my lap and ill bet ull scream-sell cc gen 350k rs2 each- sends: Open(Alt+P) roses are red grass is green sit on my lap and ill bet ull scream-sell cc gen 350k rs2 each- says: ™°°°♫♂BigMac♂♫°°°™---- says: screenshot is no real proof ™°°°♫♂BigMac♂♫°°°™---- says: log in? You have successfully received C:\Data\Sam's Folder\sam n jord.PNG from roses are red grass is green sit on my lap and ill bet ull scream-sell cc gen 350k rs2 each-. roses are red grass is green sit on my lap and ill bet ull scream-sell cc gen 350k rs2 each- says: on wot accoutn ™°°°♫♂BigMac♂♫°°°™---- says: the one with all cash to show me roses are red grass is green sit on my lap and ill bet ull scream-sell cc gen 350k rs2 each- says: did u even listen to wot i sed roses are red grass is green sit on my lap and ill bet ull scream-sell cc gen 350k rs2 each- says: i bought 9.5m on sam n jord roses are red grass is green sit on my lap and ill bet ull scream-sell cc gen 350k rs2 each- says: i gave it for an account, x kill kbd x roses are red grass is green sit on my lap and ill bet ull scream-sell cc gen 350k rs2 each- says: and hes took it back ™°°°♫♂BigMac♂♫°°°™---- says: you got that cash on sam n jord? roses are red grass is green sit on my lap and ill bet ull scream-sell cc gen 350k rs2 each- says: i bought 9.5m on sam n jord roses are red grass is green sit on my lap and ill bet ull scream-sell cc gen 350k rs2 each- says: i gave it for an account, x kill kbd x roses are red grass is green sit on my lap and ill bet ull scream-sell cc gen 350k rs2 each- says: ™°°°♫♂BigMac♂♫°°°™---- says: ur a fucking lyer roses are red grass is green sit on my lap and ill bet ull scream-sell cc gen 350k rs2 each- says: im nt ™°°°♫♂BigMac♂♫°°°™---- says: dick head.. forgot one thing. at the bottom it says moparscape web client.. roses are red grass is green sit on my lap and ill bet ull scream-sell cc gen 350k rs2 each- says: huh ? ™°°°♫♂BigMac♂♫°°°™---- says: Idiot.. ™°°°♫♂BigMac♂♫°°°™---- says: I gave you the chance to own up mate roses are red grass is green sit on my lap and ill bet ull scream-sell cc gen 350k rs2 each- says: wtf ? ™°°°♫♂BigMac♂♫°°°™---- says: now you have gone and blown it roses are red grass is green sit on my lap and ill bet ull scream-sell cc gen 350k rs2 each- says: wot the fuck ™°°°♫♂BigMac♂♫°°°™---- says: Shows no rs screen at the bottom ... roses are red grass is green sit on my lap and ill bet ull scream-sell cc gen 350k rs2 each- says: bigmac shut the fuck up, i baught 9.5m with my own fucking money ™°°°♫♂BigMac♂♫°°°™---- says: Right of course mate.. Don't bullshit it shows mopars web client. roses are red grass is green sit on my lap and ill bet ull scream-sell cc gen 350k rs2 each- says: what does ? ™°°°♫♂BigMac♂♫°°°™---- says: the fucking screenshot roses are red grass is green sit on my lap and ill bet ull scream-sell cc gen 350k rs2 each- says: lool i canceld it u prick ™°°°♫♂BigMac♂♫°°°™---- says: idiot... you are pretty dumb ™°°°♫♂BigMac♂♫°°°™---- says: you said you bought this money right.. but the proof shows that you're lying. roses are red grass is green sit on my lap and ill bet ull scream-sell cc gen 350k rs2 each- says: so dont be giving me that shit u dick weed, i bought 9.5m with my own money bought an account called x kill kbd x and its been hacked back roses are red grass is green sit on my lap and ill bet ull scream-sell cc gen 350k rs2 each- says: wot proof ? roses are red grass is green sit on my lap and ill bet ull scream-sell cc gen 350k rs2 each- says: i canceld the screen shot dick head ™°°°♫♂BigMac♂♫°°°™---- says: Ok right. So why send me this screenshot with the supposed pic of you with your money. And say it's your account. When it clearly shows You were using moparscape ™°°°♫♂BigMac♂♫°°°™---- says: Man you have no brain roses are red grass is green sit on my lap and ill bet ull scream-sell cc gen 350k rs2 each- says: i canceld the screenshot roses are red grass is green sit on my lap and ill bet ull scream-sell cc gen 350k rs2 each- says: so thats where ur rong dick head ™°°°♫♂BigMac♂♫°°°™---- says: No you obviously didn't ™°°°♫♂BigMac♂♫°°°™---- says: Accept file: sam n jord Open(Alt+P) ™°°°♫♂BigMac♂♫°°°™---- says: Ah you are messed in the head.
And the picture he sent me is this ... Note the many mistakes that proves it is no way on an actual rs screen. I'm sad to end this friendship but i did on the first day say to him " look i know this is rubbish just own up to it i know you can't do this " But he insisted otherwise. If you were intending on using a Credit Card generator then you’re just as guilty as he is. Using one is considered fraud.

agreed.

item.title: Evidence of a lier

@bigmac wrote:

Right… Exernet i had no intention atall in using a credit card generator. He tried sending me it so many times and i declined every time.
Ask flamed fury.
I would have liked the cash obviously but i wouldn’t have taken illegal action in anyway.
I’m sorry if i hurt you cowie but you brought it on yourself.
